description: Use this template to request login and registration information before the app can be started. It shows an option to login/register and displays a login form view and register form view. For example, create a Facebook* app or Twitter* app.
title: Login View App
tooltip: Use this template to request login and registration information before the app can be started. It shows an option to login/register and displays a login form view and register form view. For example, create a Facebook* app or Twitter* app.
